E

ExternalJsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore - Class in org.modeshape.connector.filesystem
An extension of JsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore that stores the properties in a separate configured directory than the filesystem federation itself.

Default constructor.

F

FedoraFileSystemConnector - Class in org.fcrepo.connector.file
This class extends the FileSystemConnector to enable the autocreation of Fedora-specific datastream and content properties.
